name: ThinkAhead
description: The concept of the game is to fill the board tiles using the knight chess piece. Levels start of simple, but become more complex leading up to the 10x10 board at the 60th level. Easy mode shows you the cells uoy can click on. It will help you to get uset to the gameplay.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 Vista / 7 Processor: Intel速 Pentium速 III or higher Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB or higher Storage: 200 MB available space
